name: Icarus Proudbottom Teaches Typing Collection
description:
Please note: This is a collection of old Flash games, completely untouched from their original forms. This is NOT a remaster or a remake. As you might expect, it's slightly janky.

If you launch the EXE directly instead of using the itch.io launcher, Windows will give you a warning. You can bypass this warning by clicking "More Info" and then clicking the "Launch" button.

The single-player Icarus Proudbottom Teaches Typing web games, finally available as a single download.

When you download this collection, you get:

  1. Icarus Proudbottom Teaches Typing: The original game, made in one month for a Something Awful game jam. A short comedic romp through the world of typing.
  2. Icarus Proudbottom's World of Typing Weekly: The messy, episodic, overly-ambitious sequel, heavily inspired by Twin Peaks. Solve an otherwordly murder mystery over the course of five episodes.

Mac version coming ASAP. Sorry, Mac friends. It's difficult to get Flash games working on Windows nowadays, and OSX is another story!



Are you a fan of Icarus Proudbottom Teaches Typing? The following products might interest you!

  • Icarus Proudbottom's Typing Party, one of the world's first and only local multiplayer typing games. Currently set up as an arcade cabinet at Wonderville in Brooklyn, NY.
  • Our soundtracks, available on BandCamp. The Teaches Typing soundtracks are available here, along with a handful of other releases.
  • Our Etsy store (Holy Wow Merch World), where we sell stickers, t-shirts, and other goodies!
